method.name: SetLogging
method.tp:docstring: Set logging verbosity and which operations are logged.

arg.name: domains
arg.tp:docstring: A combination of logging domains separated by commas (','), or "NONE" to disable logging. Each domain enables logging for operations related to that domain. Available domains are: [NONE, HW, RFKILL, ETHER, WIFI, BT, MB, DHCP4, DHCP6, PPP, WIFI_SCAN, IP4, IP6, AUTOIP4, DNS, VPN, SHARING, SUPPLICANT, USER_SET, SYS_SET, SUSPEND, CORE, DEVICE, OLPC]

property.name: State
property.tp:docstring: The overall state of the BarcodeManager daemon.

signal.name: DeviceAdded
signal.tp:docstring: A device was added to the system

arg.name: device_path
arg.tp:docstring: The object path of the newly added device.

signal.name: DeviceRemoved
signal.tp:docstring: A device was removed from the system, and is no longer available.

arg.name: device_path
arg.tp:docstring: The object path of the device that was just removed.

tp:enum.name: BM_STATE
tp:enum.tp:docstring: Describes the overall state of the daemon.

tp:enumvalue.tp:docstring: The BarcodeManager daemon is in an unknown state.
